1.name: parameter-description
1.description: parameter objects should have a description

4.name: operation-summary-or-description
4.description: operation should have summary or description

5.name: operation-tags
5.description: operation should have non-empty tags array

6.name: path-keys-no-trailing-slash
6.description: path item keys should not end with a slash

7.name: openapi-tags
7.description: openapi object should have non-empty tags array

8.name: reference-no-other-properties
8.description: reference objects should only have a $ref property

9.name: pathItem-summary-or-description
9.description: pathItem should have summary or description

10.name: example-value-or-externalValue
10.description: example should have either value or externalValue

11.name: reference-components-regex
11.description: reference components should all match spec. regex

12.name: no-script-tags-in-markdown
12.description: markdown descriptions should not contain <script> tags

13.name: info-contact
13.description: info object should contain contact object

14.name: contact-properties
14.description: contact object should have name, url and email

16.name: server-not-example.com
16.description: server url should not point at example.com

17.name: license-apimatic-bug
17.description: license url should not point at gruntjs
